actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
  SET       CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE1= {{appsmith.store.vayCrComAddr1}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE2= {{appsmith.store.vayCrComAddr2}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_CITY= {{appsmith.store.vayCrComCity}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_DISTRICT= {{appsmith.store.vayCrComDistrict}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_ZIP= {{appsmith.store.vayCrComPinCode}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_STATE= {{appsmith.store.vayCrComState}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_COUNTRY= {{appsmith.store.vayCrComCountry}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_NO =  {{PhoneInputCommNo.value}},
 	CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_EXTEN = {{Input2.text}}	,
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE1= {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegAddrr1}},
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_LINE2= {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegAddrr2}},
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_CITY= {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegCity}},
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_DISTRICT= {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegDistrict}},
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_ZIP= {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegPinCode}},
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_STATE= {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegState}},
	CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_COUNTRY= {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegCountry}},
	CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_NO = '',
 	CUSTOMER_REG_PHONE_EXTEN = '',
	CUSTOMER_REG_EMAIL= '',	
	CUSTOMER_COMM_EMAIL = {{InputCommEmail.text}},
		CUSTOMER_ISGSTINVOICING_ADDRESS = {{SelectAddressforGSTInvoicing.selectedOptionValue}},
	CUSTOMER_ADDRESS_GSTTAXID = {{InputGSTTAXID.text}}
WHERE CUSTOMER_OID ={{appsmith.store.customerOID}}
AND CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE = 'E_ADDRESSTYPE_BOTH'
